annotation.spannedText: booster doses should be given as needed

classMention.mentionClass: booster doses should be given as needed

annotation.spannedText: Anyone who has been bitten by an animal, or who otherwise may have been exposed to rabies, should clean the wound and see a doctor immediately

classMention.mentionClass: Anyone who has been bitten by an animal, or who otherwise may have been exposed to rabies, should clean the wound and see a doctor immediately

annotation.spannedText: A person who is exposed and has never been vaccinated against rabies should get four doses of rabies vaccine - one dose right away, and additional doses on the third, seventh and fourteenth days

classMention.mentionClass: A person who is exposed and has never been vaccinated against rabies should get four doses of rabies vaccine - one dose right away, and additional doses on the third, seventh and fourteenth days

annotation.spannedText: They should also get another shot called Rabies Immune Globulin at the same time as the first dose

classMention.mentionClass: They should also get another shot called Rabies Immune Globulin at the same time as the first dose

annotation.spannedText: A person who has been previously vaccinated should get two doses of rabies vaccine - one right away and another on the third day

classMention.mentionClass: A person who has been previously vaccinated should get two doses of rabies vaccine - one right away and another on the third day

annotation.spannedText: Find out if you should be vaccinated before you travel abroad.

classMention.mentionClass: Find out if you should be vaccinated before you travel abroad.

annotation.spannedText: Prepare for your vaccination visit by reading what to expect

classMention.mentionClass: Prepare for your vaccination visit by reading what to expect

annotation.spannedText: People at increased risk of exposure to rabies, such as veterinarians, animal handlers, rabies laboratory workers, spelunkers, and rabies biologics production workers should be offered rabies vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: People at increased risk of exposure to rabies, such as veterinarians, animal handlers, rabies laboratory workers, spelunkers, and rabies biologics production workers should be offered rabies vaccine
